creator: sankar.b321@gmail.com
text:
I have installed Apache 2.2.8 and with apache_2.2.8-win32-x86-openssl-0.9.8g.msi installer. in the windows xp system.

Problem:
1.When I tried to start Apache from 'start apache in console' it says nothing and remain in the console in blank for several times.

2.During this period I could not open the error.log or access.log
3.I tried to test to confirm the starting of apache , it displays 'Page can't be dislpayed'.

Any help in this regards is highly appreciated.

Kind Regards,
Sankar.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
These appear to be user-confusion questions.  Starting in a console is not
a very interesting display.  Accessing the error/access logs should be through
your filesystem, not through httpd, and they aren't "browsable files", but
plain text files.  No idea how you would be accessing these, but...

issues.apache.org is not for user support, but correcting bugs in the apache
httpd software.  please pose such questions to the peer to peer users mailing
list, instead.
